Vamprah::

"It's sound a bit confuse, I know... even for me it's confuse" Said 
the femme sighing "I think that he wanted that I had to be all my 
loyalty to him... after few welcome's words, he commanded to other 
bot that was around to leaded me toward my quarters and I had to take 
a breath there before recive my first commands"

She stopped to wait more questions.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer nods. "So he reprogrammed you as a new recruit?"
> 
> This story was a bit confusing, but he'd listen through it.
